text: Ara ebhabe apanara raba apanake manonita karabena ebam apanake sbapnera byakhya [1] siksa debena [2] ebam apanara prati o iyaâ€™kubera paribara parijanadera upara tamra anugraha purna karabena [3], yebhabe tini eta age purna karechilena apanara pitr-purusa ibarahima o isahakera upara [4]. Niscaya apanara raba sarbajna, prajnamaya
